Content: Senior Worker: Everyone in this office seems busy…
Senior Worker: But why am I so idle and have nothing to do...
John: Hey, George said you have the flash drive?
Senior Worker: I have that, but can you answer a question for me?
John: I have time for that.
Senior Worker: Do you think this company is a good company to stay for a long time?
John: Why not? I can have a better title and good reputation if I stay in here, and working hard.
Senior Worker: That is a completely wrong thought!
Senior Worker: I have the same thought as you do, when I first come to this company.
Senior Worker: I was doing so hard, compelete all the task and having a good reputation around this company.
Senior Worker: But as I getting older, I cannot do the same thing in such a efficient way. Just like you do.

Senior Worker: In last week, I was demotioned by the Business team and transfer to this logistics department. Can you imagine this? A successful seller become a worker that handle the messy of the company.
Senior Worker: And they dont let me do anything in this department. I dont even have a friends on here. I think they want me quit this compnay by myself.
John: Well, if likes you said, you need to talks to the upper levels. Or reported to the union.
Senior Worker: I know what I want to do, Thank you for listening to my complaint. Here is the Flash drive.
John: Sorry, but I dont have timer for that! I got many works to do.
Senior Worker: Even a little time for this old man is not neccessary? You will get paid for this!
Worker1: I need to have some coffee.
Worker2: Have you heard that recently, there is a new Asian in our group. He is so serious about his work, I don't even know who he is showing to.
Worker1: Yeah, he doesn't look like a person who does a good job. Maybe he is taking break during the work time.
Worker1: Or, he has a relative person above us, what a incompetent person.
Worker2: Hum, it is better to extinguish some fire from him. Should we play a prank on him?
Worker1: Lets talk about it after work??
John: (Are they talking about me?)
John: Hello guys! What are you guys talking for?
Worker1/2: Nothing about it.
John: Well, I have recently heard some racially discriminatory remarks, it shouldn’t be yours.
Worker1: That is not us. Can you do your own jobs and do not interrupt with us?
John: If you guys are not racism, I will keep doing my jobs.
John: There are many racism discrimination rumor around this office.
John: Maybe I need to mention what I learn from the company rule, and at first. No discrimination between colleagues, it include gender, age and…
John: Race
Worker1: This is the freedom of speech, I can said what I want.
John: Nope, the freedom of speech doesn't mean you can judge some gift for other person. People cannot choose where they born, what race and color they have.
John: We are all equals.
Worker1: OK!OK! (Not helpful, they are still talking about it!!!)
John: Stop that racism language!
Worker1: Wow, seems the Asian child heard what we talking for.
John: I heard it, in fact, if you guys are learning some of the history in this country. You will know this country is made by immigrant.
John: So stop your sense of superiority that comes from your ancestor.Stop haten Asian.
Worker2: You cannot change what the society think you are. Just give up to it.
John: I will keep doing this, and all Asian will do it, too. And we will stand our position.
Worker1/2: We will see it in the future. But now, you got me.
John: Hey, do you know where can I find the key card?
Worker: Nope, and don’t ask me. I am doing my project.
John: Ok, What is your project like?
Worker: You are in the tech department, so what do you think I am.
John: So you must be the programmer for our website… Cool, So what are you writing for?
Worker: New feature that can management our E-platform selling. (Whisper: How? Those block of code is totolly correct, but the system are failling!)
John: That will be good… So, Why this line is missing a semicolon?
Worker: What?!?! That works, thanks a lot bro!
John: You welcome, so did you know where I can find the card to the upper stair?
Worker: I don’t have that, sorry. But I can tell you something about it. All the key card are in the warehouse, and the warehouse are in the room that contains most of the box.(L2M4)
John: Thanks, I will looking for it.
John: What a weirdo…
John: Hey, I am working on the Business Department and want to deliverd a file to the upper level.
L2-Leader: You must be the new Asian right? Your math must be very good. HAHA, do me a favor so I will give you the card.
John: (Read the Title) Mr.George, it is not funny to use stereotype for other person. Especially for someone just met.
George: Don’t be so serious about that, working should be easy and passion about it. So, did you accept that?
John: What do you want me to do?
George: Easy peasy, there are an important file that contains our storage information in the logistics department.
George: I ask them to send those file to me, but seems they forgot about it. Go there are find the file to me.
John: Sure.
John: I will not helping someone that use otherone's stereotype as a joke. I will find the card by myself.
George: Whatever you want, KungFu master.
John: Here is the flash drive.
George: Very well! Your ability is impressive, here is the card!
John: Hey, How do you do bro?
Enemy: Wow, seems our company has a little Asian.
John: What did you said?
Enemy: Why your eyes are so small? (Squint his eyes) What are you going to do? Mop this floor?
John: Ridiculous, I am leaving.
Enemy: What is on your pocket? Did you want to report me? (Reach out)
John: Don’t touch me!
(Your file is been broken, You can have it from the copy machine)
John: How are you?
Harry: Did I know you before?
John: I am sure not. I came from business department, my name is John.
Harry: Harry, can you do me a favor?
Harry: I am trying to use the projector in my meeting, but the projector are not working!
John: Let me look at it…
John: The software is correct.. Wire is conneted… Power is good…... Wait a second..
John: You are in the wrong channel, you need to switch to the "Computer mode"
Harry: Oh, that is interesting. Thanks You!
John: Let me know if you have more question about it.
John: Have you try ture it off and on it again?
Harry: Of course i have...
John: Then I don’t know how to do it!
Harry: Sure, maybe I need to call someone in tech department…
